page.title: 34A Day in the Life
page.content:
On Saturday 11th June 2011

I woke up at 7:00 because I heard a knock on the door. It was my cousin and my neighbour. My cousin asked if I would go skateboarding with them. I had to ask my Mum and she said yes.

At the skate park we couldn’t get in because it was closed. So we skateboarded home. We stopped at McDonald’s on the way.

We got home, I ate my McDonald’s and went to sleep.


Pupil-Montbelle School
